short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The search extension for Haskell language's packages and functions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Haskell Search Extension

## Search scope
Currently include search all package on Package, and functions in the following libraries:

aeson
base
bytestring
conduit
containers
mtl
template-haskell
transformers
time
unordered-containers
text
array
exceptions
directory
filepath
process
ghc-prim
binary
random
http-client
async
deepseq
http-types
network
stm
lens
hashable
tasty
vector
QuickCheck
optparse-applicative
extra
unix
Win32
network-uri
parallel
effectful
HTTP
parsec
pretty
utf8-string
syb

## How to use
Input keyword `hs` with a space, and then enter any word you may like to search.
